page.title: 12RECREATION RIVER NAIRN
page.content:
{THE GO-KART TRACK}has been open to the public for a number of years. It costs{Â£1.00}for a five minute ride on a low{slung,four-wheeled vehicle powered by a{2oo cc engine}which can reach speeds of{35 m.p.h.}The track only opens in the summer months. { The Nairn and District Amateur {Athletic Club}Has recently been allowed the use of a piece of reclaimed ground near the river mouth. There they have laid out a{4oo m}grass running track,there are also{ {falicilties}for{long jump,high jump {etc.}The club are at present trying to get permission to build changing and club rooms. They have a membership of{ {60}aged nine upwards,meet throughout the summer on Tuesday and Thursday evenings and on Sunday afternoons.
{ }
